dimensions:
A. Warp: 14 cm (5 1/2 in.). Weft: 89 cm (35 in.). Both selvedges present
B. Warp: 84.5 cm (33 1/4 in.). Weft: 43 cm (17 in.). Left selvedge present.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 33 cm (13 in.) Width of repeat: 28 cm (11 in.).
title: Fragments
medium:
Materials: cotton
Technique: block-printed with resist then immersion dyed for blue. All other colors block printed.                   
Plain weave foundation with three rows of paired bands of red weft at the heading. In the innermost band there are four areas of red supplementary weft.
description: Design of curving branches bearing flowers in three reds, grey, yellow and black on a blue background.
name: Fragments
